entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 06:58 AM PST Monday 23 January 2023
